issue.title: subt_gazebo/CommsClient.hh: No such file or directory

content.raw:
Try replacing:
'#include <subt_gazebo/CommsClient.hh>'
with:
'#include <subt_communication_broker/subt_communication_client.h>'

I just ran into the same issue. It looks like that code was refactored but subt_seed hasn't been updated yet to reflect the new naming.
content.html:
Try replacing: '#include <subt_gazebo/CommsClient.hh>' with: '#include <subt_communication_broker/subt_communication_client.h>'

I just ran into the same issue. It looks like that code was refactored but subt_seed hasn't been updated yet to reflect the new naming.
